value:
$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|$w0|How intriguing. You managed to
battle your way to me.$k$pPrincess Veronica said that the
Order of Heroes had the advantage
of a legendary summoner.$k$pClearly, that is true.$k$pStill, we'll put a stop to you now.
Laslow? Peri? Let's show them that
we will not fall to their force.$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You fought well. I admit defeat.
This means that the contract that
binds us is now broken.$k$pThose of my world are no longer
compelled to fight you—or to
invade the Askran Kingdom.$k$pBut I choose to stay at the side
of Princess Veronica. Next time
we meet, I will defeat you.$k$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|How can a Hero like Xander choose
to stay loyal to Veronica and the
Emblian Empire?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|There are Heroes who help the
people of our world by their own
free will.$k$p$EFace_Normal2|There is something about you that
wins over Heroes very quickly,
$Nu.$k$pBut it's highly unusual and happens
only rarely.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Two of my best friends are Heroes!
That's why they stay with us. I only
wish I had more friends like them.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|I've told you before, Sharena.
Heroes are not friends. Only our
allies. Don't get close to them.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile2|$w0|Oh, you. Don't be prickly. You think
that only because you were once
very close to a Hero.$k$pAnd THAT one left to go home.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Enough, Sharena.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|Well, am I right or not?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Let's speak of it no more. We should
make our way back to the castle.$k$pSurely there's another mission that
we need to prepare for.$k$Sbs150|
